Current Version: Responsive - Tablet

Change log:

Responsive - Tablet

  • Add height of mega menu to header to push content down

Responsive

  • Widened to 1280px
  • Minimum width of 768px
  • Don't display the symbol and search forms if too small

1.1.5

  • Removed bottom arrow pointing up on the main tabs
  • Applied the green arrow pointing down to the selected class

1.1.4

  • Updated codebase with UAT version of bella-nav
  • Increased the amount of time of "hoverIntent" from 50 to 85 for better effect
  • Implemented $tempCurrent on line 2236, 2250, and 2278 for removal of ".current" on hover of the other nav items

1.1.3

  • Added URLs to megamenu object for top level menu items (Accounts, Research, Retirement)
  • Replaced the current URLs of javascript:void 0 to the URLs defined in the megamenu object
  • Commented out console.log('closed'); in closeFlyouts() function definition
  • Changed navigation interaction from click to hover
  • Added hoverIntent to the sub menu inside the mega drop down
  • Because hoverIntent hijacks events, initial showing of first submenu items had to be manually initialized/shown instead of relying on .trigger('mouseover')

1.1.2

  • Global Nav utility links null state color from #c0c0c0 to #D8D8D8
  • Symbol & Search field null state background colors from #4d4d4d to #5B5B5B
  • Symbol & Search field text null state colors from #8c8a8a to #CCCCCC
  • Indices market name text null state color from #c0c0c0 to #898989
  • Indices market value text null state color from #7c7c7c to #CCCCCC
  • Move Money & Alerts text null state color from #c0c0c0 to #D8D8D8
